rooms.description: An inviting lobby that welcomes guests, ensuring good Vastu alignment with the main entrance facing north-east.
A spacious Bohemian living area with vibrant decor; dining area integrated, ensuring natural light from east-facing windows.
Functional kitchen with a view towards the west to keep fire and stove safe per Vastu guidelines.
A cozy guest bedroom with a balcony for relaxation, placed on the south side for good energy flow.
Compact library space integrated near the living area, promoting knowledge and creativity in a quiet corner.
Small storage and utility space for cleaning and maintenance supplies.

openings.notes: Each bedroom has its own balcony ensuring privacy and natural light.

openings.description: Access to a two-car garage beneath the house.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a large balcony, positioned to receive morning light from the east.
A bohemian-themed bedroom with an adjoining balcony and artistic decor for a relaxed vibe.
Functional bedroom with a balcony, ensuring privacy and good ventilation.
En-suite bathroom for Master Bedroom 1, located on the east to avoid water flows in the sleeping zone per Vastu guidelines.
A shared family bathroom strategically placed near bedrooms to facilitate ease of access.

openings.notes: Ensuring spacious balconies for each bedroom on the upper level.
